meanings.sent1: After the fabric shrank, she had to restretch it to fit the frame.
meanings.sent2: He is restretching the rubber band to make it longer.
meanings.sent3: The cat kept restretching the yarn, thinking it was a fun game.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like restretching a rubber band - it could only go so far before snapping.
meanings.sent5: The sun slowly restretching its rays across the sky as morning turned to afternoon.

meanings.sent1: The restretching of the canvas was necessary to fix the wrinkles.
meanings.sent2: The restretching of the muscles helped prevent injuries during the workout.
meanings.sent3: The restretching of the balloon made it look like a funny, elongated shape.
meanings.sent4: The restretching of the truth only made the situation more confusing.
meanings.sent5: The restretching of the fabric created a smooth surface for painting.
